title: A Day of Farm Management
text: Calibrating the sprayer. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. We record yields and monitor feed intake. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft.
